channel.title: Past Events on Winja
channel.description: Recent content in Past Events on Winja

item.title: Winja Meets CTF for GIRLS (CTF4G) | SECCON 2020
item.description: Representatives of Winja CTF (India) and CTF for GIRLS (Japan) communities had a conversation during SECCON 2020 conference.

item.title: Winja Talks | 03 October 2020
item.description: In this special edition of Winja Talks, we invited three diverse speakers. While two of the speakers have created challenges for our Winja CTF competitions in recent past, the third speaker belongs to a team that has won several Winja CTF competitions organised by us over the years.

item.title: Winja CTF | c0c0n XIII
item.description: Winja organised Capture-the-Flag competition for all, women and men participants, at c0c0n 2020 security and hacking virtual conference.

item.title: Winja Blogs | September 2020
item.description: We conducted a technical blog writing workshop for women participants.

item.title: Winja Talks | 22 August 2020
item.description: We invited women speakers to present technical talks on a topic of their choice.

item.title: Winja CTF | Nullcon Goa
item.description: Capture-the-Flag competition was organised for women-only participants at Nullcon Goa 2020 security conferece.
